title: Sajid Javid – 2016 Speech to Automotive Summit
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Sajid Javid, the Secretary of State for Business, Innovation and Skills at the SMMT International Automotive Summit 2016 held in London on 29 June 2016.
